revision.text: __NOTOC__ These are ordered in the original sequence. The parenthesized numbers after the headings indicate priority, as decided at the time of the discussion. # Empty set: do we need it? (1) # Filled ellipse or not filled? (2) # Semantics of state variables: several unspecified semantics (3) # Shape of a complex & what's under the shape (multiple questions) (4) #* emek: do shapes have to touch inside? does topology indicate anything? # Shape of compartments (4) #* can compartments can have any shape? #* emek: are we allowing nested compartments? #* emek: are membranes separate compartments? #* emek: there are neighborhood relationships -- are we going to draw them? # Rectangular shape of gene (2) #* emek: what happens if several elements of one gene intersect with another? does the info get duplicated? #* stuart: would like to discuss examples of state transition vis-a-vis gene regulation # Controlled vocabulary for macromolecule labels (1) #* nicolas: also for physical properties (1) # Modulation, catalysis: use a circle? should catalysis even exist? (5) #* mirit: do we want all of them in SBGN L1? #* emek: also trigger and others #* also topic of shape of modulation & rescaling diagrams #* anatoly: should there be multiple shapes? or one shape for all? put smth inside the diamond? # All boolean connectors: (5) #* emek: highly tied to modulation # Module: shape, content, terminals (3) #* also: can a connector connect to a component inside the complex # Hiroaki: discussing reduced notation (1) # Rules for drawing layout (eg avoid overlap, etc.) (1) #* falk offers to prepare a list # Do we want to incorporate annotation glyphs? (1) # Do we want to discuss the languages used to implement SBGN? (0.5) # Do we want to include generic entities in L1? (1) #* ralph: eg is event # Entity-relationships: how to proceed? (1) #* mirit: must make sure to heed orthogonality goals # Hiroaki: arrows? (1)
